body:
```
$ spack install laghos
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    hypre@2.14.0%gcc@7.2.0~int64+internal-superlu+mpi+shared arch=linux-gentoo2-x86_64


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    mfem@3.3.2%gcc@7.2.0~conduit~debug~examples~gnutls+gzstream+hypre~lapack~libunwind+metis~miniapps~mpfr+mpi~netcdf~openmp~petsc~shared+static~suite-sparse~sundials~superlu-dist~threadsafe timer=auto arch=linux-gentoo2-x86_64
        ^openmpi@3.0.1%gcc@7.2.0~cuda fabrics= ~java~memchecker~pmi schedulers= ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=linux-gentoo2-x86_64
            ^hwloc@:1.999
                ^pkgconfig
            ^numactl
                ^autoconf
                    ^m4@1.4.6:
                    ^perl
                        ^gdbm
                            ^readline
                                ^ncurses
                ^automake
                ^libtool
            ^zlib


mfem requires hypre version 2.10.0:2.13.999, but spec asked for 2.14.0
```

Related to #7903
title: laghos cannot be build
